Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.name: iRailID
Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.abstract: iRail defined url that defines an NMBS railway station

Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.name: originalName
Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.abstract: The name of the station in the original language

Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.name: location
Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.abstract: 2D coordinate indicating the geographical location of the railway station

Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.name: id
Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.abstract: A unique url for the railway station defined by the iRail project.

Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.name: name(in:)
Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.abstract: Translate the name in a specified locale

Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.name: description
Structs/RailwayStation.html#/s:4NMBS14Ra.abstract: The name of the station in the user locale’s language

Structs/Trip.html#/s:4NMBS4TripV6trainsS.name: trains
Structs/Trip.html#/s:4NMBS4TripV6trainsS.abstract: A sequence of trains that will bring you from A to B

Structs/Trip.html#/s:4NMBS4TripV8duratio.name: duration
Structs/Trip.html#/s:4NMBS4TripV8duratio.abstract: The total amount of time needed to get from A to B with the trains

Structs/MovingTrain.html#/s:4NMBS11Movin.name: direction
Structs/MovingTrain.html#/s:4NMBS11Movin.abstract: The direction the train is moving to

Structs/TrainStop.html#/s:4NMBS9TrainSto.name: platform
Structs/TrainStop.html#/s:4NMBS9TrainSto.abstract: The platform on which the train will stop

Structs/TrainStop.html#/s:4NMBS9TrainSto.name: delay
Structs/TrainStop.html#/s:4NMBS9TrainSto.abstract: A time interval that should be added to time to get a realistic prediction

Structs/TrainStop.html.name: TrainStop
Structs/TrainStop.html.abstract: A position in time and space where a train stops and people can enter or exit a train

Structs/MovingTrain.html.name: MovingTrain
Structs/MovingTrain.html.abstract: A train moving in a speciefied direction

Structs/SingleTrainTrip.html.name: SingleTrainTrip
Structs/SingleTrainTrip.html.abstract: A trip between two railway stations that only uses one train

Structs/Trip.html.name: Trip
Structs/Trip.html.abstract: A trip between two railway stations consisting of one or more SingleTrainTrip‘s

Structs/RailwayStation.html.name: RailwayStation
Structs/RailwayStation.html.abstract: Basic information of a railway station provided by iRail

Functions.html#/s:4NMBS16downloadStation.name: downloadStations()
